data.text: I went for iftar and i was impressed , I can say it's the best Buffet in Dubai , congratulation Bab Al shams for such a beatiful JOB , Variety , Quality , Taste , everything you want.. And the staff are just amazing , you just think what you want and they will be doing it already, I had an amazing Waiter , I believe his Name was Yasser , egyptian from his accent , he was just a Wow , Thank You for the beautiful experience
data.title: Iftar at Hadeera

user_location.name: Abu Dhabi, Emirate of Abu Dhabi

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Yvette R,

Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us.

We are absolutely thrilled to know that you were impressed with our Iftar buffet in our signature Al Hadheerah Restaurant and that you consider it to be the best in Dubai. 

It means the world to us to learn that you enjoyed the variety, quality, and taste of our offerings. We are also delighted to hear that our staff, especially Yasser, made your experience even more memorable. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to him and the rest of the team. 

Thank you again for choosing to dine with us, and we hope to welcome you back for another beautiful experience soon.

Warm regards,

Bab Al Shams Desert Resort Management
owner_response.author: Jacques Le Roux

data.text: We went there for the day and we wanted to do the safari drive but without the falconry show and dinner as we’ve done it in the past. What a wonderful experience was! 50 minutes drive through the dunes with the very experienced Ismail who is not just the nicest, funniest but also the best photographer! If you want to create a memorable experience, we would strongly recommend to ask for Ismail as your driver, he is the BEST!
data.title: Best safari drive!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 120anamariac,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your recent visit at Bab Al Shams Desert Resort.

We are glad to know that you had a wonderful experience during your desert drive with Ismail. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to him, as we are sure he will be delighted to know that he made such a positive impression. 

We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable adventure.

Warm regards,

Bab Al Shams Desert Resort Management
owner_response.author: Jacques Le Roux

data.text: I had an amazing desert dune experience by Isamel with my family.  He took the time to explain everything, super energetic and fun.  My daughter had the best time in the desert ride, super exciting.  He also took the time to take so many amazing pictures for us.  Highly recommend if you are staying at the Bab AL Sham to book this trip, I promise you will not regret it, it was the highlight of our trip! thank you so much.  tip, book in sunset time.
data.title: Bab Al Sham Desert Experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Yvette R,

Thank you immensely for sharing your experience with us. We are thrilled to know that you had an incredible desert drive experience with Ismail and that he went above and beyond to make it unforgettable for you and your family. Providing exceptional service and creating cherished memories is our top priority, and we are delighted that Ismael's enthusiasm and expertise enhanced your adventure.

It is fantastic to know that your daughter had such an exciting time during the desert ride, and we are glad that Ismail captured so many amazing moments for you through his photography skills.

Your recommendation means the world to us, and we couldn't agree more about booking during sunset for an even more magical experience. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back for more unforgettable moments at Bab Al Shams in the future.

Warm regards,

Bab Al Shams Desert Resort Management
owner_response.author: Jacques Le Roux

data.text: We went here on a day pass. Could not get booked in for food which was a bit disappointing. The place is like an oasis in the desert  and that I’d exactly  where in is, in the desert. The layout is great with different pools. Buildings are nicely Layden out and the Starr as expected were really attentive and polite. Drinks from the swim up bar were good with a lot to choice from. For me looking out over the pools into the desert was a sight not to miss.
data.title: Nice place for a day pass

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear AJracer54,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your recent visit at Bab Al Shams Desert Resort.

We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your day pass visit to our desert oasis.

We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding the booking for food. We strive to provide a seamless experience for all our guests, and we regret that we couldn't accommodate you on this occasion. Your feedback is valuable, and we will use it to improve our booking process for future guests.

It is wonderful to know that you appreciated the layout of our facilities, including the different pools, and found our buildings nicely laid out. We are also pleased that our staff exceeded your expectations with their attentiveness and politeness.

We are glad you enjoyed the variety of drinks available at our swim-up bar. Providing a wide selection for our guests is important to us, and we are happy it added to your experience.

The view of the desert from our pools is truly breathtaking, and we are thrilled you had the opportunity to enjoy it.

We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another memorable visit in the future. 

Warm regards,

Bab Al Shams Desert Resort Management
owner_response.author: Jacques Le Roux

data.text: My girlfriend and I did the desert safari at bab al shams. Muhammad was our guide and it was great. Very professional and took us on a fun ride in the dunes and even took us to a preserve to watch the animals. Muhammad was very professional and took great videos of us. Thank you.
data.title: Desert safari at bab al shams

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear ajborja82,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your recent visit at Bab Al Shams Desert Resort.

It's wonderful to know that you and your girlfriend had such an enjoyable experience with Muhammad on your desert drive. We pride ourselves on offering exceptional experiences and it sounds like Muhammad went above and beyond to ensure your adventure was memorable, from the thrilling dune ride to the serene animal watching at the preserve. We are thrilled to know that his professionalism and extra effort in capturing videos added to your enjoyment. 

Thank you for sharing your positive feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back for more adventures in the future.

Warm regards,

Bab Al Shams Desert Resort Management
owner_response.author: Jacques Le Roux
